title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 3B.07 - Warrants for Use of Edge Lines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 3B.07 - Warrants for Use of Edge Lines

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 04. INSERT the following paragraph: Option: 03A Edge line markings may be placed on other paved streets
or highways, with or without center line markings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
3B.07

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
